home_page.title: Welcome to our caring and professional dental practice
home_page.subtitle: WE <HighlightedSpan>GIVE</HighlightedSpan> YOU YOUR MOST BEAUTIFUL <HighlightedSpan>SMILE</HighlightedSpan>

team_page.subtitle: Welcome to our team’s page! We are dedicated professionals passionate about providing you with top-notch dental care. Our mission is to bring you a smile full of health and confidence. Thank you for trusting us!

service_page.subtitle: We offer a comprehensive range of dental services to keep your smile healthy and beautiful. Our specialists use the latest technologies and provide personalized care for every patient. Trust your smile to the experts!
service_page.errorFetchingServices: An error occurred while loading services.
service_page.noServicesAvailable: No services available at the moment.

contacts_page.welcome_text: We’re always happy to assist you! Here you can find our contact information, feel free to reach out.
contacts_page.subtitle: Our contact details

errors.usernameLength: Username must be between 2 and 16 characters.
errors.passwordLength: Password must have at least 1 character.
errors.usernameStartsWithSpace: Username should not start with a space.

messages.passwordResetSent: Password reset link has been sent!

makeAppointment.buttonDisabledText: Please fill in all required fields

errors.firstCharCannotBeSpace: First name cannot start with a space.
errors.firstNameLetterCount: First name must be at least 2 characters (en, de)
errors.firstNameLetterCountMax: First name must be less than 64 characters (en, de)
errors.firstNameExtraSpaces: First name cannot have consecutive spaces.
errors.firstNameInvalid: First name can only contain letters (en, de) and one space
errors.lastCharCannotBeSpace: Last name cannot start with a space.
errors.lastNameLetterCount: Last name must be at least 2 characters (en, de) and one space
errors.lastNameLetterCountMax: Last name must be less than 64 characters (en, de) and one space
errors.lastNameExtraSpaces: Last name cannot have consecutive spaces.
errors.lastNameInvalid: Last name can only contain letters (en, de) and one space
errors.phoneNumberInvalid: Please provide a valid phone number.
errors.emailInvalid: Please provide a valid email address.
